{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I can prove  1 = 2"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step1}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"  Lets say  "},{"type":"text","text":"y = x","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".   Multiply  by x   "},{"type":"text","text":"xy = x2x^2x2","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step3}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Subtract "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" from each side "},{"type":"text","text":"xy - y2y^2y2 = x2x^2x2 - y2y^2y2","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step4}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Factorize each side "},{"type":"text","text":"y(x-y) = (x+y)(x-y)","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step5}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Divide both sides by (x-y)    "},{"type":"text","text":"y = x+y","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step6}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Since x = y  "},{"type":"text","text":"y = y + y","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step7}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" And so... "},{"type":"text","text":"y = 2y","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{Step8}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Divide both the sides by y  "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{1 = 2}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Which step is wrong?"}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since x = y "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{\text{x - y = 0}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
In Step 5 we have divided x-y by x-y, that is equal to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{0}{0}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" which is not defined "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Hence Step 5 is incorrect."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: What Is The Relationship Between Each Terms?
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x, \\ \\frac {5x}4, \\ \\frac 92, \\ \\ldots  "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"\n\n"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given that the above is an "},{"type":"text","text":"arithmetic progression","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":", find the common difference."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                    "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relevant wiki: Arithmetic Progressions","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"d"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" denote the common difference."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since this is an arithmetic progression, the difference between each consecutive terms are equal, namely,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large d = \left( \frac {5x}4 \right) - x = \left( \frac92 \right) - \left( \frac{5x}4\right) "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simplifying the right side, we have "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large 5x-4x=18-5x "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large x=3 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large d = \left( \frac {5x}4 \right) - x = \frac { 5(3) }{ 4 } -3 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \large d=\frac { 3 }{ 4 } =\boxed { 0.75 }  "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
